thread.title: Girls Day at Tech Museum aims to inspire tomorrow's leaders
thread.title_full: Girls Day at Tech Museum aims to inspire tomorrow's leaders - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Girls Day at Tech Museum aims to inspire tomorrow's leaders
text: The Tech Museum of Innovation hosted the first ever Girls Day. The event, which is the first of three, aims to inspire young girls -- and boys -- to pursue careers in science, technology, engineering and mathematics through hands-on workshops and activities. The next two events will be in March and May. ...
